title: Topic 001 Question 065
body: You plan to deploy a containerized version of an Azure Cognitive Services service that will be used for sentiment analysis.
You configure https://contoso.cognitiveservices.azure.com as the endpoint URI for the service.
You need to run the container on an Azure virtual machine by using Docker.
How should you complete the command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
